title: Moroccan Oil Hair Treatment 3.4 Oz Bottle with Blue Box
description: Moroccanoil is an ultra-light formula which is absorbed by the hair instantly, resulting in a natural, silky finish and brilliant shine.  Moroccanoil has the ability to restore over-processed hair damaged by environmental factors and chemical procedures - it also revives, hydrates and detangles hair, wigs and hair extensions.

title: MoroccanOil Intense Curl Cream,300ml Bottle
description: Impressive anti-oxidants and intensive hydration capabilities, this breakthrough styling product is used to enhance and define curly hair.

title: Moroccan Oil Intense Hydrating Mask 8.5 Ounce
description: Introducing the power of Moroccanoil. The Moroccanoil treatments have the ability to restore condition to over-processed hair, caused by colour procedures, perms and enviromental factors. This Intense Hydrating Mask is a rich, creamy treatment, designed to hydrate and help repair damaged hair. Moroccanoil's Intense Hydrating Mask is a high performace mask that does not need heat to be activated; only 5 to 7 minutes will treat hair with needed moisture whilst helping to add shine and elasticity.With continued use, this highly effective mask helps revitalise hair, restoring shine and manageability.

title: Revlon RV2641 Soft Touch Porcupine Cushion Brush, Colors May Vary
description: The Revlon RV2641 Soft Touch Porcupine Cushion Brush has dual bristles and pin cushions for smoothing and sleekness.  This cushion style brush gives a scalp massage effect that is very soothing and healthy for your hair.

title: Dermalogica MediBac Clearing Clearing Mattifier Acne Treatment-1.3 oz
